title: Ep 172: Embracing the Third Third of Life with Anne Lamott
itunes:title: Ep 172: Embracing the Third Third of Life with Anne Lamott
itunes:subtitle: Kate has a cocktail with friends and stays out a little too late and Doree makes fun summer plans. Then, author Anne Lamott joins the podcast to talk about her new book Dusk, Night, Dawn, living in the third third of life, and getting married for the f...
description:
Kate has a cocktail with friends and stays out a little too late and Doree makes fun summer plans. Then, author Anne Lamott joins the podcast to talk about her new book Dusk, Night, Dawn, living in the third third of life, and getting married for the first time at 65. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
